name: Drow Scout

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
text: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Drow Scout to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, Drow Scout has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: <$title_short_name$>'s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10). <$title_short_name$> can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
text: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 191
